agilermi.configuration

Interface Remote

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RandomAccessService, RemoteInput, RemoteOutput, RMILogger

    public interface Remote
    Marker interface for remote interfaces. This interface is used to explicitly and statically mark the application interfaces whose instances must be all remote objects. Each remote method should throw RemoteException or it should be annotated with RMISuppressFaults. If not, the remote method can throw UndeclaredThrowableException whose cause can be RemoteException.
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampa'
